reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major adrenal cortex disorders: Addison's disease (~0.8 per 100k), Cushing's syndrome (~2-5 per 100k), adrenocortical carcinoma (~0.5 per 100k), primary aldosteronism (~5-10 per 100k), congenital adrenal hyperplasia (~2-3 per 100k), and other adrenal insufficiencies (~15 per 100k). Total ~25.5 per 100k. Heterogeneous group with varying prevalence/incidence reporting.
